content:
I'm happy to help you with your toothpaste query! However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or knowledge of your specific morning routine or the products you're currently using. I'm a text-based AI assistant, and our conversation just started!

That being said, I'd be happy to help you find a toothpaste that meets your needs and budget. Could you please tell me more about the toothpaste you're currently using? What are its key features, ingredients, or benefits that you like about it? Are you looking for a specific type of toothpaste (e.g., whitening, sensitive teeth, natural ingredients)?

Also, I'm glad to hear that the Neutrogena face wash is working well for you! If you have any questions or need recommendations for skincare or oral care products, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to assist you.
